name: Huntail
description: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be burned.  If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
